price: 39. Cifriit ka mid ah jinka baa wuxuu yidhi: Anigaa kuu keenaya ka hor intaad ka kicin golahaaga, oo xaqiiq waxaan anigu ahay mid xoog u leh oo aamin ah.
arabic: قَالَ عِفۡرِيتٞ مِّنَ ٱلۡجِنِّ أَنَا۠ ءَاتِيكَ بِهِۦ قَبۡلَ أَن تَقُومَ مِن مَّقَامِكَۖ وَإِنِّي عَلَيۡهِ لَقَوِيٌّ أَمِينٞ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qāla ʿif'rītun mina al-jini anā ātīka bihi qabla an taqūma min maqāmika wa-innī ʿalayhi laqawiyyun amīnun
